name: LogicTree IT Solutions
description:
We are a resourceful organization with dynamic professionals having commendable experience in Web & Mobile Platforms. Our employees have extensive knowledge and proficiency on latest Technologies like E-Commerce, LAMP, CMS, Java, J2EE, Adobe Flash & Flex, Microsoft products like .NET, Dynamics, Silverlight, SharePoint and Mobile Technologies like Apple iOS, Android, Blackberry and Symbian.
The wide ranges of industries covered by us are Banking & Finances, Telecom, Retail, Healthcare & Insurance, Travel, Supply Chain, Automotive, Real-Estate and etc. A very well organized and managed company with a Management having 15 years of experience in the IT Industry, we follow high standard of Ethics. We take every care to honor IP rights.
Please visit us at www.logictreeit.com for more details.
